metadata.name: Install Root Certificate
metadata.comment: Detects installation of new certificate on the system which attackers may use to avoid warnings when connecting to controlled web servers or C2s

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/update-ca-certificates')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/update-ca-trust'))))

output.summary: Detects installation of new certificate on the system which attackers may use to avoid warnings when connecting to controlled web servers or C2s

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1553.004/T1553.004.md
